name: Single Sheet Set
description:
We are giving a 5 year guarantee on our sheets, No Pilling and no stretching out of shape for 5 whole years! or you get your money back no questions asked!

Enjoy the indulgence of a luxurious night’s sleep with our Hotel weight luxury cotton sheets. Superior quality cotton, an exceptionally high quality thread and a weight of 160g (retail sheets are normally 90g) combined to create a superior quality fabric that feels beautiful. These sheets offer the epitome of luxury with the minimum of fuss, as they can be tumbled dried and require minimal ironing.

Single sheet set consists of 2 x single sheets and 1 x pillowcase

name: Pillowcase
description:
Dont ever pay full retail again for superior quality sheet, our vision at lucky lucky bang bang is to bring luxury quality linen to everyone, at a an affordable price. This linen retails out at $45 a pillowcase and we think you shouldn't have to pay that. To back up this statement we are giving a 5 year guarantee on our sheets, please read this guarantee under our guarantee section on our site.


Enjoy the indulgence of a luxurious night’s sleep with our Hotel weight luxury cotton pillowcase. Superior quality cotton, an exceptionally high quality thread. with a thread count of 200g and a weight of 160g, combine to create a superior quality fabric that feels beautiful. These pillowcases offer the epitome of luxury with the minimum of fuss, as they can be tumbled dried and require minimal ironing.

Pillowcase consists of 1 x Pillowcase

name: Inspirational bedroom ideas
description:
Please disgregard the 5c cost, i needed to put a price in to be able to put my inspirational bedroom ideas on here with a picture.

I hope you enjoy them, if you have any links for pictures that you love, I would be happy to add them to the site. Send them through..
